H0.text: Static protons are the entities through which energy is transferred in an electrical circuit.

H1.text: Moving protons transfer energy in an electrical circuit.

H2.text: Static electrons are the means by which energy is transferred in an electrical circuit.

H3.text: Moving electrons transfer energy in an electrical circuit.

A4.text: In metallic solids, electric charge flows by means of electrons, from lower to higher electrical potential.

A5.text: The free electrons of the conductor are forced to drift toward the positive terminal under the influence of this field.
